title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dave Rubin & Brandon Michon | 1/28/21
description:
Pat Gray stops in to discuss the new regulations regarding flying with a firearm. What is happening with GameStop stock, and why are people so fired up about it? A troll on Twitter was arrested for making memes. Is this the future of America? BlazeTV’s Dave Rubin joins to talk California Gov. Gavin Newsom’s popularity, liberals’ changing views on Biden, and how quickly the world can change. The angry Virginia dad in a viral video, Brandon Michon, joins to share the story of his passionate plea to his school board to reopen schools.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
